name: nos4
description:
Unfolding of a nos4 sparse matrix into a lattice. The original matrix describes a beam structure and is first documented by H. Simon in 1982. In this simulation, the matrix is represented as a lattice with 100 nodes which undergoes a process of unfolding until it reaches equilibrium. 

@lukapiskorec, mp4, 1000 x 1000 pix, 200 frames
